name: Aragorn
title: King of Gondor and Arnor
appearance: Tall and noble with dark hair and gray eyes
armor: Royal armor of Gondor with the white tree emblem
beliefs: Hope, justice, and the restoration of the kingdoms of Men
powers: Healing touch, longevity of the Dúnedain, Wisdom
weapons: Anduril (the Flame of the West), bow and arrows
backstory: Born in Rivendell as the son of Arathorn, Aragorn was raised by Elrond. A ranger of the North, he traveled the wild lands for many years. He learned of his heritage and destiny, eventually claiming the thrones of both Gondor and Arnor.
